bibl.title: A Broken Marriage Promise and Justinian as a Lover of Chastity. On Novela 74 and P. Cair. Masp. I 67092 (AD 553).
bibl.note: The present paper was originally presented at the international seminar Las mujeres y la práctica jurídica en el imperio romano in San Sebastián-Donostia on 4 November 2011. - 1. Novela 74: the rationale. - 2. Marital agreement in Novela 74. - 3. P. Cair. Masp. I, 67092. - Pp. 148-151: Postilla: C. Th. 3, 7, 3 and Nov. Maior. 6, 9 as the presumed turning points in the Roman law of marriage.
bibl.seg: Urbanik Jakub, A Broken Marriage Promise and Justinian as a Lover of Chastity. On Novela 74 and P. Cair. Masp. I 67092 (AD 553).

The present paper was originally presented at the international seminar Las mujeres y la práctica jurídica en el imperio romano in San Sebastián-Donostia on 4 November 2011. - 1. Novela 74: the rationale. - 2. Marital agreement in Novela 74. - 3. P. Cair. Masp. I, 67092. - Pp. 148-151: Postilla: C. Th. 3, 7, 3 and Nov. Maior. 6, 9 as the presumed turning points in the Roman law of marriage.
